title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is an ornate spear, embodying a mystical aura with its sleek, elongated design. Its shaft is a deep, shimmering purple, hinting at the power contained within. Adorned with intricate golden details, the spearâ€™s head features a sharp, pointed tip, suggesting both elegance and deadliness. The decorative elements, including a swirling motif and gem inlay, enhance its ethereal quality. This weapon is not just a formidable tool in combat; it symbolizes status and mastery over the arcane. Ideal for skilled combatants or spellcasters, it serves as both a physical weapon and a conduit for magical energy.
